ResourceDoesNotExist.Description: The requested resource does not exist
ResourceDoesNotExist.Message: The resource %1 in provided URI does not exist
ResourceDoesNotExist.Resolution: Update the URI for resource and resubmit the request if the operation failed

PropertyValueNotInList.Description: The requested property is not in the list of properties for the resource
PropertyValueNotInList.Message: The value %1 for the property %2 is not in the list of acceptable values
PropertyValueNotInList.Resolution: Remove the property from the request body and resubmit the request if the operation failed

PropertyNotWriteable.Description: The requested property is read only
PropertyNotWriteable.Message: The property %1 is a read only property and cannot be assigned a value
PropertyNotWriteable.Resolution: Remove the property from the request body and resubmit the request if the operation failed
